strapiEvent.name: Rogers Public Library Hosts Author Panel and Book Reading
strapiEvent.description:
Recognizing the importance of representation in children's literature, Rogers Public Library will host the fourth annual We Write For You, a Black children's book author and illustrator panel and reading, on Saturday, Feb 11, at 2p.

  • Introducing: Hosted by the Phi Alpha Omega Chapter of Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Inc. and the Tea Rose Foundation of NWA, this year's panel includes four award-winning national authors and illustrators: Ashley Franklin, Vashti Harrison, Rafael Lopez, and Rita Williams-Garcia.
  • Take it home: Food and drinks will be provided for all attendees, and children ages 0-17 will receive free books.

Learn more and register for the event HERE.
